text: The Cellar Boy is an oil painting on canvas by Jean-Baptiste-Siméon-Chardin. It was painted sometime between 1736 and 1738. It measures 46 cm x 38 cm (18.11 in x 14.96 in). It hangs in a private collection. Chardin chose themes that were popular with all classes of Parisian society. == References == * Category:1730s paintings Category:Paintings by Jean-Baptiste-Siméon Chardin Category:1738
title: The Cellar Boy
